testCase.name: LoginComponent form should be invalid if field is empty
LoginComponent form should be invalid if not according to password requirements
LoginComponent form should be invalid with invalid email address
AppComponent should have as title 'Online eKarting platform for various sports, fitness equipments'
LoginService validateUser function returns false when user data does not exist in mock db
LoginService validateUser function returns true when user data exist in mock db
HeaderComponent should show login/signUp button when user is not logged in
